map_heatmap_description: Toggle heatmaps to visualize noise levels (red = noisy) and air quality (red = poor air quality)
noise_score_description: Higher = Quieter (considers traffic, temples, major roads)
air_quality_description: PM2.5, AQI, and dengue risk assessment
safety_description: Accident hotspots, crime rate, pedestrian safety
convenience_description: YouBike stations, public transport, essential services

how_it_works_search_desc: Enter any address in Taiwan to get an instant livability score.
how_it_works_scores_desc: We analyze noise, air quality, safety, convenience, and zoning risks.
how_it_works_premium_desc: Unlock detailed insights with comprehensive data breakdowns.
landing_title: The truth about your future apartment.
landing_subtitle: Noise, pollution, hidden risks. Discover what the real estate agent won't tell you.
landing_social_proof: Over 10,000+ addresses analyzed in Taipei, Taichung, Kaohsiung.
teaser_summary: This address is {noiseLevel}, but watch out for {concern}.
teaser_unlock_subtext: Includes: Factory details, accident history & future zoning
report_save_promo: Save this report to an account
info_aqi_desc: Below 50: Excellent. Above 100: Risky for sensitive groups.
info_noise_desc: 40dB = Library. 60dB = Conversation. 80dB = Heavy Traffic. Sleep disturbance above 65dB.
mock_ad_1_desc: Reduce street noise by 40dB with our new double glazing windows.
mock_ad_2_desc: Quiet and fast moving service. Avoid the stress of change.
about_mission_desc: TranquilTaiwan helps you discover the truth about your future home. I analyze noise levels, air quality, safety metrics, and neighborhood risks that real estate agents don't always mention.
about_vision_desc: I believe everyone deserves transparent information when making one of life's biggest decisions. My goal is to empower residents with data-driven insights about livability in Taiwan.
about_how_step1_desc: Enter any address in Taiwan. Our system geocodes the location and gathers data from multiple sources.
about_how_step2_desc: We analyze noise (traffic, temples, major roads), air quality (PM2.5, AQI, dengue risk), safety (accident hotspots, crime rates), convenience (YouBike, public transport), and zoning risks.
about_how_step3_desc: Each metric is normalized to a 0-100 scale and weighted: Noise (25%), Air Quality (25%), Safety (20%), Convenience (15%), Zoning Risk (15%).
about_team_desc: I'm Eliot Meurillon, a full-stack developer with a master's degree from EFREI. After my studies and several projects in France, I chose to settle in Taiwan to live an international experience, discover the local ecosystem, and develop tech projects in a multicultural context. Today, I continue my journey between development, product, and entrepreneurship.
about_contact_desc: Have questions or feedback? I'd love to hear from you.
sources_intro: Transparency is at the core of what we do. Here's where our data comes from and how we calculate scores.
sources_data_taiwan_gov_desc: We use official APIs from Taiwan's government data portal, including traffic data, air quality monitoring stations, and zoning information.
sources_data_license_desc: All government data is used under the Open Government Data License, allowing free use and redistribution.
sources_methodology_intro: Our livability score combines five key factors, each weighted based on their impact on quality of life:
sources_methodology_noise: Noise (25%): Analyzes proximity to major roads, temples, and traffic density. Higher scores indicate quieter areas.
sources_methodology_air: Air Quality (25%): Considers PM2.5 levels, AQI readings, and dengue fever risk zones. Updated from monitoring stations.
sources_methodology_safety: Safety (20%): Evaluates accident hotspots, crime statistics, and pedestrian safety infrastructure.
sources_methodology_convenience: Convenience (15%): Measures access to YouBike stations, public transport, and essential services within walking distance.
sources_methodology_zoning: Zoning Risk (15%): Assesses risk from adjacent industrial or commercial zones that may impact residential quality.
sources_update_desc: Air quality and traffic data are updated daily. Safety and zoning data are refreshed monthly. Historical trends are tracked to show changes over time.
legal_privacy_intro: TranquilTaiwan is committed to protecting your privacy.
legal_privacy_data_desc: We collect addresses you search to provide livability scores. Addresses are stored temporarily for caching purposes and are not shared with third parties.
legal_privacy_cookies_desc: We use essential cookies for functionality and may use analytics to improve our service. No personal information is collected without your consent.
legal_terms_intro: By using TranquilTaiwan, you agree to the following terms:
legal_terms_use_desc: TranquilTaiwan provides informational scores based on available data. Scores are estimates and should not be the sole factor in housing decisions. Always verify information independently.
legal_terms_liability_desc: We are not responsible for decisions made based on our scores. Data accuracy depends on source APIs and may contain errors or be outdated.
legal_license_desc: Government data used in this service is provided under the Open Government Data License (OGDL). This license allows free use, modification, and redistribution of the data.
legal_contact_desc: For questions about this legal information, please contact us at eliot.meurillon@gmail.com
map_instructions_step2: 2. Click on the map to place a pin
map_instructions_step3: 3. The score will be calculated at this location
map_popup_click_to_search: Click to search at this location
error_address_not_found_suggestions: Address not found. Please select an address from the suggestions or try a different search.
error_address_not_found: Address not found. Please select an address from the suggestions.
error_search_failed: Failed to search address. Please try again.
error_calculate_failed: Failed to calculate score. Please try again.
